title: Victoria Beckham jokes about her sex life with hubby David on US chat show
text:

She's known for having a serious face but it seems there is a topic that will make Victoria Beckham giggle.

The former Spice Girl, who has carved a successful career as a fashion designer, joked about her sex life with hubby David on an American chat show.

The mum-of four and former footballer, who was nicknamed Golden Balls during his sporting days, have notched up 20 years of married bliss in July.

The Daily Mail reports that during a chat on The View, the 45-year-old also described David as "wonderful" and how lucky she was to have him as her soulmate.

(Image: The View)

Asking Victoria about the success of their marriage the show's host Joy Behar said: "You have to be friends with somebody after many years together, because the sex, eh..."

To which Victoria giggled: "Don't worry about that!"

Victoria wrote a letter to her 18-year-old self back for Vogue last year, offering marriage tips.

She said: "In marriage: have patience. Bite your tongue. Be supportive. And preserve a bit of mystique.

(Image: The View)

"Never let yourself go completely (at least brush your hair, clean your teeth, have a bit of a brow going on because you will always want him to look at you and feel attracted)."

David said previously that the secret to keeping their relationship alive was having a dedicated date night every Wednesday.

The couple got married in a ceremony on July 4, 1999, which is reported to have cost £800,000.

(Image: MDM)

David had just won the treble with Manchester United and Victoria was with the girl group which recently reformed and toured without her.

She is claimed to have turned down the chance to sing again.

The couple's children are Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14 and eight-year-old Harper Seven.
